40000606.text: Here, you can check which <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul</> you have equipped, meow!

40000607.text: And if you click here, meow...

40000608.text: (Now, should I move to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>square</> and meet the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>?)

40000609.text: Wait! Did you know we already accomplished a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Goal</>?

40000610.text: You can check all your achievements <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>here</> in <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Goals</>!

40000611.text: This is the first Goal we completed together. Oh, don't forget to pick up your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>reward</>.

40000612.text: You should check your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Journal</> often for any <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Goals</> you've completed.

40000613.text: Huh? You don't' know about your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Journal</>? Okay, I'll explain that to you, too.

40000614.text: It contains the record of our journey together.

40000615.text: Here, you can check the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>quests</> you're currently doing or that are available.

40000616.text: You can also check their <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>objectives</>. Hey, are you listening to me?

40000617.text: All right, that's all for my explanation. Now, I'll see you later!

40000618.text: Now, let's take a look around the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Shop</> where you can buy <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Souls</>, meow!

40000619.text: Here, over here! Come on, check this out, purr!

40000621.text: Hm, let's see what you can use... Here, this! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Press</> it, purr.

40000622.text: Wait, wait just a moment, meow! You'd better check its <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>details</> before you buy it.

40000623.text: Make sure to read <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>all the precautions</>, purr.

40000624.text: Okay, are you done reading? Then, let's go meet a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul</>, mrrow!

40000625.text: Now, press <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Buy</> and meet a new Soul!

40000626.text: Let's find out what kind of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul</> you've summoned, purr!

40000628.text: There they are, purr! You can check your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Souls</> right here!

40000629.text: Let me tell you more, meow. Open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Map</>.

40000630.text: By going on adventures, you can make <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>various discoveries</> here and there. That'll also raise your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Adventurer Grade</>, meow!

40000632.text: Press here, and you can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>windstride</> to get there!

40000634.text: Let's try out the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Patron Scroll</> you just got, purr. Open your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bag</>.

40000636.text: Press the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Scroll</> to use it. Press it <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>twice</>. Got it? Twice!

40000637.text: Wait! Don't you want to check out the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Patron</> you just got, meow?

40000638.text: If you want to meet your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Patron</>, remember to come here, purr.

40000640.text: Tap here to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Summon</> or <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Remove</> a Patron!

40000641.text: Hey, where are you looking at?

40000642.text: I told you to check the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Chivalry Quest Board</>.

40000644.text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Accept</> a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>quest</>, and you can get on with it right away. Easy, isn't it?

40000645.text: (I'd better get ready first. Should I use a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Return Stone</> and drop by a village?)

40000647.text: (All right, I've found a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Return Stone</>! I should select it.)

40000648.text: (By using a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Return Stone</>, I can go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>New Fishbelly Pub</> from here.)

40000649.text: What do you do if your bag still gets full? All right, open your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>inventory</>,

40000650.text: and you can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>expand</> its space like this.

40000651.text: Unfortunately, you can't do it for free. You can, however, expand it with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gold</> to a certain extent.

40000652.text: Or you could leave it to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Storage Keeper</>. Try using it.

40000653.text: Wait, let me tell you something before you go.

40000655.text: Register <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>gear</> you found in the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gear Codex</>, and you can get some beneficial effects.

40000656.text: You can also buy gear at the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Shop</> and the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Market</>. You'd better not forget that.

40000658.text: If you see <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Storage Keeper</> like me, you should speak to them like this.

40000659.text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> merchants are here to help you keep your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>items</> safe.

40000660.text: Feel free to leave <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>items</> with us and pick them back up anytime you want.

40000661.text: If you see <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>merchants</> like me, you should speak to them like this.

40000662.text: Then, you'll see their <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>sale list</> at a glance like this.

40000663.text: (I've seen everything I can. Let's go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Barren Ruins</> where <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</> is.)

40000664.text: You can also check available hunting grounds on the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Map</> like this.

40000666.text: I'll give you this. Open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bag window</>, meow.

40000667.text: By the way, we also run a shop. Talk to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Basic Technique Tome Merchant</>.

40000668.text: Hurry up and drink it, meow! You'll feel your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blade Chi</> increase!

40000672.text: Press the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>technique</> for which you want to use the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Essence</>.

40000673.text: The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Essence</> I just gave you can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>amplify</> the technique you've selected.

40000674.text: Now, use the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Amplify Essence</> and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>amplify</> the technique.

40000677.text: The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>memories</> obtained from <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Noi</>'s Caelite. Do you know where they can be seen?

40000678.text:
In the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Saga</>. The memories which we've found,
as well as the ones we need to find, are all there.

40000679.text: See all these <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>memories</>? Okay, pick one.

40000680.text: We'll obtain the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Memory Shards</> from <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Tomo</> and visit all those places!

40000681.text: You don't know your worth yet.

40000682.text: All right, then I'd better introduce you to the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Rank System</>. Let's open <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Rank</>, shall we?

40000684.text: And here, you can check the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>top players</> and the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>benefits</> that they receive.

40000685.text: It'd be great to journey with such strong companions, wouldn't it? I knew you'd say that!

40000686.text: How about I introduce you to the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Clan System</> as well?

40000687.text: Have you heard of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>clans</>? You can take a look at them here.

40000688.text: I bet it'd be a good experience to join a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>clan</> and grow alongside some like-minded people.

40000689.text: Let me tell you how to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Craft</>.

40000692.text: Since this is your first time, we can start by crafting an <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>accessory</>.

40000693.text: This <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>accessory</> here looks suitable to craft and equip at your level.

40000694.text: Are you ready to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>craft</> your first accessory?

40000695.text: Now, you just wait for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>crafting</> process to be completed.

40000696.text: Wow, good job! This is how you do it. Keep it up.

40000697.text: All right, while you're here, how'd you like to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>enhance</> your gear?

40000699.text: Press and hold the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>armor</> I just gave you.

40000700.text: You can press here to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Enhance</> it,

40000701.text: but first, you have to have an <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Enhance Scroll</>.

40000702.text: I'll let you use <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>this one</> for now.

40000704.text: and then press <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Enhance</>. Not hard at all, right?

40000705.text: Haha! You've made it! I guess you've got a knack for this.

40000706.text: You're pretty good with your hands. I might as well teach you how to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Salvage</>.

40000708.text: Press and hold the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>armor</> you just enhanced to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Salvage</>.

40000709.text: You don't want to waste it? Haha! Don't worry.

40000710.text: Utilize <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Salvaging</> often! You can obtain <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>items</> that way, too.

40000712.text: How is it? Do you feel different, meow?

40000714.text: You can check the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blade Chi</> you acquired here!

40000715.text: With <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blade Chi</>, you can increase your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blade</>'s <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>level</>, meow.

40000716.text: Each <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blade</> has a different <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>effect</>, meow! Try pressing this.

40000721.text: Lastly, if you press here, you can turn <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blade</> on and off!

40000722.text: Don't forget that attacking with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Blade</> activated requires <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Chi Orbs</>, meow!

40000724.text: (I've acquired a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Technique Tome</>. I should open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bag window</>.)

40000727.text: (Press <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Learn</> to learn the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>technique</> written in the scroll.)

40000731.text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Slide it down</> to use the technique <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>automatically</>.)

40000733.text: Did you know there's another way to get <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>quests</>?

40000734.text: Press here, and you can see the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>quests</> that you can complete.

40000735.text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Quests</> that are available for you will be displayed here. Ah, here's one.

40000736.text: Select the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>quest</>, and you can see <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>its details</>.

40000737.text: You can also <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>auto-move</> to the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>quest location</>. Make good use of it.

40000738.text: Actually, I have another favor. But I have to tell you something.

40000739.text: If there are people who make a request like I did, it will be marked here.

40000740.text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Quests</> that are available for you will be displayed here. Could you check mine first?

40000741.text: Check here to see if a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>quest</> is suitable for you to take on right now.

40000742.text: Have you heard about the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Oracle</>? It's said to be an item that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>enhances</> <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>techniques</>.

40000746.text: Then, you can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>inject</> the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Oracle</> like this.

40000747.text: I hope you get the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Oracles</> for the techniques you want and develop your techniques.

40000748.text: Do you know the way to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>labyrinth</>?

40000749.text: Haha, I'll teach you. Just press here.

40000751.text: Now, this is the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>labyrinth</>. You can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Windstride</> there right away, so use it at your leisure.

40000752.text: (I've received an <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>outfit</> as a cheering gift! I should open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bag</>.)

40000756.text: (Hmm... This is good! I should hurry up and open it.)

40000757.text: (Should I try on the outfit in the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Wardrobe</>?)

40000761.text: Say, do you get it now? Then, could you press here and accept my <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>request</>?

40000762.text: (Should I <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>equip</> the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>gear</> that I just got? First, open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bag</>.)

40000764.text: (Should I <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>equip</> the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>gear</> that I just got? First, open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bag</>.)

40000771.text:
(and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>evolve</> the technique.
I should try it.)

40000774.text: (Now's the time for my match! I'd better prepare some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Swift Pills</>. Open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bag</>.)

40000776.text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Press</> here to register them in a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Quick Slot</>.)

40000778.text: (Why don't I make some preparations before I go down?)

40000783.text: (I should press the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Bulbari</> and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>equip</> the Soul.)

40000784.text: Oh, right—now that you're in a new hunting ground, how'd you like to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>explore</> it? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Press</> here to start.

40000785.text: By <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>exploring</>, you can also get a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>reward</>, like this! It's like killing two birds with one stone, right?

40000786.text: Those guys look like they're carrying <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>slingshots</>. Why don't you go check them out?

40000787.text: Make sure to pick up your <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>reward</> whenever it's available. Don't forget!

40000788.text: All right, this should be good enough. Shall we continue on our <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>journey</>?

40000790.text: Could you press here and accept my <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>request</>?

40000791.text: By pressing <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Accept</>, you can proceed with the quest.

40000792.text: (The next <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>destination</> is a bit far away from here.)

40000796.text: Well, if you don't know where to go, just open the map.

40000797.text: You will see an area where the leylines are closed like this.

40000798.text: As you can see, you can't use the axis. To open the ley,

40000799.text: You just need to carry out the nearby pioneering quests.

40000800.text: Please find and solve the areas where the lei is closed in various places in the Haeryong Mountains.

40000804.text: If you press it once more, you can put it in the \n box.

40000805.text: This time, it's your turn to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Spirit Stone</>!

40000806.text: If you insert <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Spellstone</>, \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Available Stats</> is shown here\n!

40000809.text: Depending on the combination of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Spellstone</>, you can get \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>additional stats</>!

40000811.text: The way to leave as a recovered time line is simple.

40000812.text: You'll be able to leave with the time line at any time through this road.

40000813.text: I will not be as easy as the beginning \n Look for \n colleagues to do with it.

40000814.text: I can not be able to do it alone.

40000816.text: To use <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>drawn </> to use <textcolor = [255: 204: 102: 255]> to use </> again <textcolor = [255: 204: 102: 255]>

40000820.text: If you don't come to your senses\nfollow me,\nyou'll miss it!

40000821.text: The way to enter the tower is\n easier than you think.

40000822.text: Please select the \nMuwon Tower you see here\n

40000823.text:
First of all, it would be better to find a floor that is 
for your guy

that's right for you~

40000824.text: like that's right Compare your\nskills and the level of each floor\nand challenge

40000825.text: Well, maybe someday I'll be able to\nget to the top floor~?\nGood luck!
